value.title: Computing totals by summing visible values in DAX
value.excerpt: This video shows how to compute a measure that sums the values produced row by row in the visual into the visual total, instead of recomputing the total value in the filter context of the total. Article and download: https://sql.bi/89870

value.title: Creating real time dashboards in Power BI with push datasets

value.title: Administer Power BI, Part 2 - Premium, Power BI embedded, automation
value.excerpt: As an administrator, how do you foster collaboration and share Power BI outputs? How do you monitor and audit usage, build a data access infrastructure, and automate administration? This course will demonstrate how Power BI Premium manages capacity resources. You’ll learn how to establish a data access infrastructure and how to share Power BI reports beyond your Power BI tenant. Finally, you’ll learn how to automate common tasks with Microsoft Power BI Cmdlets for Windows PowerShell and PowerShell core.

topItems.title: Provision Premium capacity in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the differences between Power BI Pro and Power BI Premium, and how Power BI Premium manages capacity resources.

topItems.title: Establish a data access infrastructure in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to establish a data access infrastructure for accessing all your data within Power BI.

topItems.title: Broaden the reach of Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn the various ways to share Power BI reports beyond your Power BI tenant.

topItems.title: Automate Power BI administration
topItems.excerpt: Common manual tasks can be automated with Microsoft Power BI Cmdlets for Windows PowerShell and PowerShell core.

value.title: Administer Power BI, Part 2 - Tenants, governance, collaboration
value.excerpt: Power BI administrators manage every aspect of their tenant. This learning path covers advanced administrative tasks, such as fostering collaboration and sharing data. You will earn how to monitor and audit usage, build a data access infrastructure, broaden the reach of Power BI, and automate administration with APIs and PowerShell cmdlets.

topItems.title: Provision Premium capacity in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the differences between Power BI Pro and Power BI Premium, and how Power BI Premium manages capacity resources.

topItems.title: Establish a data access infrastructure in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to establish a data access infrastructure for accessing all your data within Power BI.

topItems.title: Broaden the reach of Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn the various ways to share Power BI reports beyond your Power BI tenant.

topItems.title: Automate Power BI administration
topItems.excerpt: Common manual tasks can be automated with Microsoft Power BI Cmdlets for Windows PowerShell and PowerShell core.

value.title: Architect solutions for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt:
A Solution Architect is responsible for the successful design, implementation, deployment, and adoption of an overall solution. A Solution Architect ensures that the solution meets the customer’s needs now and in the future. While the Solution Architect may not “click the buttons” during a deployment, they are ultimately responsible for the solution and work closely with the deployment team.
This learning path covers the pre-sales and analysis phases of a project to include:

What it takes to become a Solution Architect.
Discovering customer needs.
Proposing a solution.
Working with requirements.
Performing fit-gap analysis.

Instructor-led training (ILT) is scheduled for March 2020 that provides more hands-on activities and both this path and ILT are needed for the exam.

topItems.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

topItems.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

topItems.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

topItems.title: Work with requirements as a solution architect for Microsoft Power Platform and Dynamics 365
topItems.excerpt: It is important to capture the customer’s needs accurately. This module explains how to capture requirements and identify functional and non-functional items.

value.title: Implement and manage an analytics environment
value.excerpt: Implement and manage an analytics environment

topItems.title: Provide governance in a Power BI environment
topItems.excerpt: Learn the fundamental rules, regulations, and policies of a BI governance approach.

topItems.title: Facilitate collaboration and sharing in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to collaborate and share dashboards and reports with coworkers.

topItems.title: Monitor and audit usage
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use activity logs and auditing with Power BI to monitor and inspect user activity in a Power BI environment.

topItems.title: Provision Premium capacity in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the differences between Power BI Pro and Power BI Premium, and how Power BI Premium manages capacity resources.

value.title: One Slicer to filter other slicers based on Items that has value only in Power BI without BI Directi
value.excerpt: In a star schema design, how you can filter one dimension by another dimension. How you can find all the products that this customer purchased or all customers who have purchased this product using two separate slicers. To learn more about star schema: https://radacad.com/power-bi-basics-of-modeling-star-schema-and-how-to-build-it
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cyOquvfhzNM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
